moves.1. e4: Hello everyone! This is a game that i played in a beautiful Saturday morning. The game is interesting because the action starts in the beginning and also because this game has a beautiful ending :) Enjoy!
moves.2... exd4: Black takes but white is happy:)
moves.3. Nf3 Nc6: Black tries to defend, and is looking quite good at the moment.
moves.4. c3: How is black going to play, hmm ?  What are the best moves ? If you know, write in the comments!
moves.5... f6: Black's worst move i think.  If you disagree, write your opinion below in the comments!
moves.6. Qb3: Attacking f7 square and also attacking the knight.
moves.6... Qe7: Black sacrifices his knight, but maybe he just didn't see the upcoming threat.
moves.7. Bxg8 cxb2: White takes the knight and black takes the b2 pawn because black doesn't want  7... Qxe4 8. Be3
moves.8. Bxb2: here white took the pawn, but if you think that there was a better move than write below.
moves.8... Qxe4+: He plays as expected but where should white's King go? to the right or to the left?
moves.9... Na5: A good move i thought for a moment. But actually it's a disaster.
moves.10. Qf7+: Black's King is in the corner :)
moves.10... Kd8 11. Qxf8+: This is the action i wanted :)
moves.11... Qe8: What would you do in this situation on white's side? ...
moves.13... Qe7 14. Qxg8#:
And the game is over. 
I believe these 14 moves were interesting enough to show you guys ! :-)
